subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki had 26 points and moved into the top 20 on the N.B.A. career scoring list, and the host Dallas Mavericks beat the short-handed and struggling Boston Celtics, 89-73, on Monday.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki had 26 points and moved into the top 20 on the N.B.A. career scoring list, and the host Dallas Mavericks beat the short-handed and struggling Boston Celtics, 89-73, on Monday.
